title: List of all Androidhow to use  in  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidhow to use  in  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Dagger2-Sample
repoList.description: A sample app to demo how to implement dagger in Android using Dagger Android Support library

repoList.name: android
repoList.description: Common Utils library is developed to reduce efforts to achieve common features of the android apps. While developing the apps, we realized that we’re coding for many common features in all the apps. For e.g. check the network’s availability, using shared preferences, parsing, etc. And like us, many other android developers might be doing the same. So it needs to be reduced for all to save the development time with ease. This is how an idea popped in our mind, and we decided to develop an SDK which can reduce developers’ time and efforts.

repoList.name: NoSQLiteDatabaseTest
repoList.description: How to create a database in Android using ActiveAndroid library to avoid SQLite code

repoList.name: Twitter-Sharing-Example-Android
repoList.description: This tutorial explains, how to integrate twitter in android application. The example below using twitter4j java library for login to twitter and allows to share a simple text post and image post in users twitters timeline.

repoList.name: GuidedStepsTV
repoList.description: Example on how to use the GuidedStepFragment in the Leanback library for Android TV

repoList.name: TwitterTimelineSample-Android
repoList.description: Another sample project made using Android Studio (and Gradle) showcasing how to use the Twitter4j library to properly log-in a user and show + refresh their Timeline.

repoList.name: HetrogeniousAdapter
repoList.description: You can find a clear explanation of how this library works & how to use it in your project from this article(https://medium.com/android-dev-hacks/building-a-reactive-heterogeneous-adapter-in-kotlin-eed9487df29b)

repoList.name: Retrofit-Databinding-Demo
repoList.description: This repository shows you how to use retrofit library using data binding in android. It uses MVVM pattern.

repoList.name: MultiTheme
repoList.description: Sample Project to demonstrate that how to use multi theme in Android application without using any Libraries.

repoList.name: HowToUseSupportLibrary
repoList.description: This app is make up of many samples about how to use android support libraries(v4 & v7). Some of codes are copied from Android official samples and others are written by me. For now, not all samples all finished. Welcome to fock and make a pull request to this repository in oder to make the samples clear.
